titleStmt.title: Nevves out of the Lovv-Countries, sent in two letters: the one to the Earle of New-Castle, the other to Captaine Crispe, now resident with his Majesty. Declaring the likelihood of civill warres to be betwixt the Prince of Orange, and the states of the United Provinces.
titleStmt.author: S. R.
H. R.

publicationStmt.publisher: First printed at Oxford for William Web, and since reprinted in London,

notesStmt.note: 1st letter signed S.R., 2nd letter signed H.R.
The imprint is false. "The Oxford edition probably never existed"; cf.Madan.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
